definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: a Bab. title; dubious; perhaps guardian ? (Schr:COT Da 1:11 Dl:Baer Dn xi conj. loan-word fr. As. maṣ(ṣ)aru, keeper, guardian, cf. Dl:HWB 423; hardly connected with (mod.) Pers. mulsaru ‘Kellermeister’ (cf. Meinh.), v. against this Bevan);—only c. art. ´[[הַמּ]] Da 1:11, Da 1:16.
